summary: J. D. Lavery is mentioned in three documents, all dated April 7, 1977, related to the classification of a document labeled EX 3600. The documents are memoranda concerning the justification for classifying EX 3600, citing its connection to Operation MHCHAOS, the inclusion of information from sensitive sources and classified FBI reports, and suggesting a FOIA exemption. Lavery appears to be a recipient of these memoranda, indicating a role within the Office of General Counsel (OGC) where classification decisions were being reviewed or communicated.
